name: Zombie Shooter Survival Killer
description:
Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D is a shooting zombie to save the world!
In Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D is a shooting game for enhancing the shooting skill of Ops soldier. The city is full of zombies to kill innocent people. To kill the blood thirsty zombie for saving the innocent people. Ulimate shooter shoots the zombie to save the city and enhance his skill to become a professional zombie killer. The main mission in Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D is survive the Ops soldier from the food of zombie. Ops soldier have six types of sniper guns. Zombie survival from the deadly zombie is important for Ops soldier. Racing zombie for making his food and hostage them.
Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D is a thrilling and ultimate shooter game. This game is have different missions for killing the zombie. Unlock weapons for killing the zombies. In Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D have the facility of hand grenade to killing all zombies that attacking on Ops soldier. Scary moment increase in every mission. Evil zombie killing everything in the city. In Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D have deadly dog that attack FPS person. This game is like a assault game. Tsunami of zombie trigger you to kill zombie and survive. Blood bath zombie is hostage the FPS player. To killing of zombie you become a professional hunter.

Apocalypse virus infected the whole city except you in this zombie shooting game. Entire city is infected and blood is everywhere. You and your AK47 gun are the only survivor of a zombie infection in this zombie shooter game. Trigger & sharp shoot these stupid zombies in the head to be the best killer of the city and survive against Apocalypse zombie waves / raging zombies & become zombie survivor. Dead undead target is a free FPS game where huge waves of zombies come to you as tsunami. Different species of zombies infected by dangerous virus are on village, highways, city centre, on the plants, hospital, school, bus stops, taxi stops, airport, graveyard, & subway station infecting, invading, biting and spitting on people. In Zombie Survival Killer: Death Target Shooter 3D is a best FPS shooting game. Realistic violation and much more in this game.
